Title: Relates to penalties for traffic infractions related to the operation of vehicles when approaching authorized emergency vehicles
Summary: Increases penalties for traffic violations related to the failure to properly operate a motor vehicle when approaching a parked, stopped or standing authorized emergency vehicle, hazard vehicle, vehicle displaying a blue or green light or certain other motor vehicles; increases penalties for multiple violations.
LawCode: Amd ยง1800, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to penalties for traffic infractions related to the operation of vehicles when approaching authorized emergency vehicles
